front.title: Secure Shell Transport Model for the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP)

abstract.t: This memo describes a Transport Model for the Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP), using the Secure Shell (SSH) protocol.</t><t> This memo also defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in TCP/IP-based internets. In particular, it defines objects for monitoring and managing the Secure Shell Transport Model for SNMP. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
